title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 89.6 - Policies and procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 89.6 - Policies and procedures

State Regulations

The director of the personnel services division is hereby
authorized to provide for the administration of this Part including the
issuance of such policies, guidelines and procedures as may be
necessary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
89.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
